title: Emerald & Diamond Royal Haaram - COHar00028
features: Exquisite craftsmanship featuring intricately designed Polki diamond settings interspersed with vivid green emeralds. The Haaram showcases a traditional South Indian design with a cascading pendant adorned with fine filigree work and dangling heart-shaped accents. The elaborate detailing exemplifies the skill of our artisans and offers a timeless elegance.
occasions: Perfect for grand celebrations like weddings (muhurtham)
and other auspicious occasions. Also suitable for high-end social gatherings and cultural events.
description: This Haaram embodies the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry artistry. The combination of Polki diamonds and emeralds is considered highly auspicious. Its exquisite design and masterful craftsmanship make it a valuable investment and a cherished heirloom. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine and luster.
